    animation_tree.set("parameters/OneShot/request", AnimationNodeOneShot.ONE_SHOT_REQUEST_FIRE)
    # æ›¿ä»£è¯­æ³•ï¼ˆä¸ä¸Šè¿°ç»“æœç›¸åŒï¼‰ã€‚

    animation_tree.set("parameters/OneShot/request", AnimationNodeOneShot.ONE_SHOT_REQUEST_ABORT)
    # æ›¿ä»£è¯­æ³•ï¼ˆä¸ä¸Šè¿°ç»“æœç›¸åŒï¼‰ã€‚

    # è·å–å½“å‰çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆåªè¯»ï¼‰ã€‚

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    // æ’­æ”¾è¿æ¥åˆ° â€œshotâ€ ç«¯å£çš„å­åŠ¨ç”»ã€‚
    animationTree.Set("parameters/OneShot/request", (int)AnimationNodeOneShot.OneShotRequest.Fire);
    
    // ä¸­æ­¢è¿æ¥åˆ° â€œshotâ€ ç«¯å£çš„å­åŠ¨ç”»ã€‚
    animationTree.Set("parameters/OneShot/request", (int)AnimationNodeOneShot.OneShotRequest.Abort);
    
    // ä½¿ç”¨æ·¡å‡ºçš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸­æ­¢è¿æ¥åˆ° â€œshotâ€ç«¯å£çš„å­åŠ¨ç”»ã€‚
    animationTree.Set("parameters/OneShot/request", (int)AnimationNodeOneShot.OneShotRequest.FadeOut);
    
    // è·å–å½“å‰çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆåªè¯»ï¼‰ã€‚
    animationTree.Get("parameters/OneShot/active");
    
    // è·å–å½“å‰å†…éƒ¨çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆåªè¯»ï¼‰ã€‚
    animationTree.Get("parameters/OneShot/internal_active");
